algorithm_technique: Find the two largest elements in the array and calculate the product of (element-1) for each.
problem_summary_simple: Find two different elements in an array to maximize the product of (element-1) for each.
problem_summary_technical: Identifies the two largest elements in the array in a single pass and computes the maximum product of (element-1).
key_insights: To maximize (nums[i]-1)*(nums[j]-1), we need to find the two largest numbers in the array.
A single pass is sufficient to find the two largest numbers.
The problem statement guarantees at least two elements, simplifying edge case handling.
